title: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
overview: When Aurangzeb recruits his trusted soldier Udaybhan to control the Kondhana fort, Shivaji's military leader Tanhaji Malusare and his army of Maratha warriors set out to recapture the fortress.

overview: DCP Anant and his team get tasked with escorting an alleged terrorist to Mumbai. However, a rogue ex-police officer makes their task difficult as he tries to stop them from reaching their destination.

title: Dhadkan
overview: Anjali and Dev are in love with each other and plan to marry, but her family gets her married to Ram. Years later, Dev shows up to reunite with Anjali, however, she has fallen in love with Ram.

overview: Baadshah Khan falls in love with Benazir, a member of a rival clan who has defeated him in a game of buzkashi. Benazir will not marry him unless he brings back the head of her father's killer, Habibullah, from India. He is successful, but he must return to India. He is then tragically separated from Benazir through a series of incidents that are only resolved years later with the arrival of his daughter, Menhdi, and his release from prison.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Sridevi, Shilpa Shirodkar, Kiran Kumar, Danny Denzongpa

overview: Insulted by Rosario, a rich businessman, Jai Kishen a Matchmaker teaches him a lesson by getting his daughter married to Raju, a Coolie, who poses to be a millionaire. They sense something fishy and Raju's deceptions are discovered. In an attempt to cover it up, he cooks up a story of having a filthy rich twin. One lie leads to another and things start to go awry culminating in a comedy of errors.
cast: Varun Dhawan, Sara Ali Khan, Paresh Rawal, Rajpal Yadav, Johny Lever

title: Satyameva Jayate
overview: DCP Shivansh has been tasked to catch Vir, the man behind police killings in the city. Both are eventually against the same enemy but divided by a fine line, the law.

title: English Vinglish
overview: In the United States for the first time, an Indian housewife with a limited command of English turns Manhattan into her personal language school.
cast: Sridevi, Adil Hussain, Mehdi Nebbou, Priya Anand, Navika Kotia

title: Qarib Qarib Singlle
overview: Yogi and Jaya, who have polar opposite personalities and sensibilities, meet via an online dating app. This encounter turns into so much more when the two travel to Rishikesh.
cast: Irrfan Khan, Parvathy Thiruvothu, Neha Dhupia, Luke Kenny, Brijendra Kala

title: Badlapur
overview: After his wife and son are killed, a young man finds out the man behind the murder and fights against him, along committing some big mistakes.
cast: Varun Dhawan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Huma Qureshi, Yami Gautam Dhar, Divya Dutta

title: Luka Chuppi
overview: The story of a television reporter in Mathura who falls in love with a headstrong woman.
cast: Kartik Aaryan, Kriti Sanon, Vinay Pathak, Pankaj Tripathi, Aparshakti Khurana

title: We Are Family
overview: Maya is the perfect mother. Her life revolves around her three children, Aleya, Ankush, and Anjali. Who thinks nothing much then the world of her. Despite being divorced from her husband, Aman. Maya has ensured that everything runs smoothly in her house, under her watch, and that they continue to remain a happy family unit. However, when Aman introduces his girlfriend, Shreya a career oriented woman, who has a lot to learn about children's, to the family, the situation immediately takes an unexpected turn. When an incident changes their lives drastically, bringing the two women under the same roof, they find themselves putting to test an unusual situation; can two mothers make a home?
cast: Arjun Rampal, Kajol, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Aanchal Munjal, Diya Sonecha

title: Phone Bhoot
overview: Two crazy, jobless, horror-film addicts Major and Gullu, under immense family pressure to find work, hit upon the idea to float a unique ghost-capturing service when they meet a spirit, Ragini, who makes their business a success but in return asks them for a favour which they are compelled to honour.

title: Table No. 21
overview: A couple live a mediocre life and are thrilled to have won an exotic vacation to Fiji & their excitement increases when they get a chance to play "Tell all truth" game for a mind boggling prize money. The game begins and the couple discovers that the game isn't really a game, but is a game of survival.
cast: Paresh Rawal, Rajeev Khandelwal, Tina Desai, Dhruv Ganesh, Asheesh Kapur

title: Shakuntala Devi
overview: Based on the life of Shakuntala Devi who is a well-known mathematical genius and calculating progidy from India. She has been nicknamed 'Human Computer' because of her extraordinary talent and skill in solving complex mathematical problems without any mechanical aid.
cast: Vidya Balan, Sanya Malhotra, Jisshu Sengupta, Amit Sadh, Luca Calvani

title: Deewana
overview: A singer marries his biggest fan, but his uncle plans to kill him in order to gain his money.
cast: Rishi Kapoor, Shah Rukh Khan, Divya Bharti, Amrish Puri, Mohnish Behl

title: Sandeep Aur Pinky Faraar
overview: Sandeep, a bank executive & Pinky, a suspended cop, are marked for a kill. Phones tapped, accounts blocked, they escape but escaping is not freedom.
cast: Parineeti Chopra, Arjun Kapoor, Jaideep Ahlawat, Neena Gupta, Raghubir Yadav

title: Zero
overview: Short in stature but big on love, a bachelor meets two very different women who broaden his horizons and help him find purpose in life.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma, Katrina Kaif, Tigmanshu Dhulia, Abhay Deol

title: Shor in the City
overview: Various residents and career-criminals face challenges in crime-laden Mumbai.

title: Nagina
overview: The story follows Rajni, a shape-shifting cobra (Ichchadhari Naagin) who marries a civilian, Rajiv, to avenge the death of her spouse at the hands of an evil saint. Rajiv, who comes from a wealthy family, returns to India after studying in London. His mother wants him to marry Vijaya Singh, but he falls in love with Rajni, an orphan. His mother initially opposes the marriage but later agrees. Their happiness is disrupted when Bhairon Nath, a sadhu with the ability to control snakes, arrives and reveals that Rajni is actually a Naagin seeking revenge. Bhairon Nath has his own sinister motives—he wants to capture Rajni because she knows the location of a hidden Mani, a sacred jewel that would grant him immense power. A dramatic battle ensues, leading to Bhairon Nath’s defeat, and Rajiv and Rajni live happily ever after.
cast: Sridevi, Rishi Kapoor, Prem Chopra, Amrish Puri, Sushma Seth

title: Meri Pyaari Bindu
overview: Abhimanyu Roy is stuck with writer's block until he decides to re-live the memories of his childhood sweetheart Bindu who aspires to be a successful singer and struggles to give Abhi the one thing he craves - stability.
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Parineeti Chopra, Kamalika Banerjee, Rajatabha Dutta, Prakash Belawadi

title: Gabbar Is Back
overview: A vigilante network taking out corrupt officials draws the notice of the authorities.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Shruti Haasan, Suman Talwar, Jaideep Ahlawat, Sunil Grover

title: Ishaqzaade
overview: While fighting for the political supremacy of their respective families, a Hindu man and a Muslim woman share a forbidden romance.

title: Pyaasa
overview: Vijay, a destitute poet, searches for true love while attempting to get his work published. With the assistance of two women in his life, his dream comes true - but at a cost that causes Vijay to rethink his worldview.

title: Bala
overview: A man suffering from alopecia copes with his lack of self-confidence and the societal pressure that comes with being bald.
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Bhumi Pednekar, Yami Gautam Dhar, Saurabh Shukla, Javed Jaffrey

title: Ek Villain
overview: An ex-gangster re-enters the world of violence after his wife is murdered and torments the killer by capturing and releasing him again and again.
cast: Sidharth Malhotra, Shraddha Kapoor, Riteish Deshmukh, Aamna Shariff, Asif Basra

title: Maine Pyar Kiya
overview: After Suman's father leaves her in the care of another family while he travels abroad, she falls in love with Prem. However, in order to for them to marry, Prem has to prove to Suman's father that he is not the same as his own dad.
cast: Salman Khan, Bhagyashree, Alok Nath, Rajeev Verma, Reema Lagoo

title: Dhobi Ghat
overview: Arun is a reclusive and lonely modern art painter. Shai is an American banker who is on a visit to Mumbai. Munna is a washerboy also living near Arun and Yasmin. The movie is about these four characters from different class of society and how the lives of four characters are intertwined.
cast: Prateik Smita Patil, Monica Dogra, Kriti Malhotra, Aamir Khan, Danish Husain

title: Aiyyaa
overview: Meenakshi, a Marathi gal with an ultra-sensitive sense of smell, lives her life in her dreams, dancing and enacting her favourite actresses Sridevi, Madhuri and Juhi. Not believing in arranged marriages, Meenakshi awaits her prince when she comes across Tamil artist Surya, to whom she is strangely attracted to.
cast: Rani Mukerji, Prithviraj Sukumaran, Nirmiti Sawant, Satish Alekar, Anita Date-Kelkar

title: Gangster
overview: An alcoholic barmaid is distraught when her former lover, a notorious gangster, re-enters her life. She is forced to relive painful past experiences and choose between the gangster and a pleasant singer she has found comfort in.
cast: Kangana Ranaut, Emraan Hashmi, Shiney Ahuja, Hitanshu Lodhiya, Vicky Ahuja

title: Shuddh Desi Romance
overview: A journey of three restless young people who junk the society's syllabus for finding love and decide to follow their heart.
cast: Sushant Singh Rajput, Parineeti Chopra, Vaani Kapoor, Rishi Kapoor, Rajesh Sharma

title: Special 26
overview: During the 1980s in India, a group of con artists rob businessmen and politicians by conducting fake raids, posing as officers of the CBI or Income Tax Department . They plan to execute their biggest con as a final job while a relentless cop is on their trail.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Anupam Kher, Manoj Bajpayee, Jimmy Shergill, Divya Dutta

title: Taal
overview: Businessman Manav falls for aspiring singer, Mansi, but their romance faces an uphill climb when Manav must depart and Mansi's suave manager moves in.
cast: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Anil Kapoor, Akshaye Khanna, Amrish Puri, Alok Nath

title: Ishqiya
overview: While on the run from goons, a man and his nephew fall for a kidnapper's seductive widow.
cast: Naseeruddin Shah, Vidya Balan, Arshad Warsi, Salman Shahid, Adil Hussain

title: Serious Men
overview: Tormented with his 'under-privileged' societal status, a father capitalizes on his son's newfound fame as a boy-genius. Little does he realize that the secret he harbors will destroy the very thing he loves the most.
cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Nassar, Indira Tiwari, Aakshath Das, Sanjay Narvekar

title: Khosla Ka Ghosla!
overview: Kamal Khosla's land is grabbed by a land shark named Khurana. In a bid to retrieve their land, Khosla's elder son hatches a clever plan to con the crook and enlists the help of his friends and his dysfunctional family.
cast: Anupam Kher, Boman Irani, Parvin Dabas, Ranvir Shorey, Tara Sharma

title: Kaho Naa... Pyaar Hai
overview: Sonia and Rohit love each other but Rohit is mysteriously killed. When Sonia moves to New Zealand, she meets Raj, Rohit's lookalike who helps her trace Rohit's killer.
cast: Hrithik Roshan, Ameesha Patel, Anupam Kher, Dalip Tahil, Mohnish Behl

title: Lootera
overview: In a village, a young archaeologist falls in love with a landlord's daughter. Their union seems doomed. But destiny brings them together a year later. Will they live happily ever after?
cast: Ranveer Singh, Sonakshi Sinha, Adil Hussain, Vikrant Massey, Arif Zakaria

title: Sarkar
overview: Subhash Nagre runs a parallel government in the city where he has a cult following. When his enemies plot to murder him, his son takes charge and stands up against them.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Abhishek Bachchan, Kay Kay Menon, Supriya Pathak, Katrina Kaif

title: The Deceivers
overview: India, 1825: the country lives in mortal fear of cult members known as the “Deceivers." They commit robbery and ritualistic murder. Appalled by their activities, an English military man, Captain William Savage, conceives a hazardous plot to stop them. In disguise, he plans to himself become a “Deceiver” and infiltrate their numbers. Ever present in Savage’s adventures is a sense of dread; he is in constant fear of betrayal and vengeance and also undergoes a disturbing psychological transformation as he experiences the cult’s blood lust firsthand.
cast: Pierce Brosnan, Shashi Kapoor, Saeed Jaffrey, Helena Michell, Keith Michell

title: Rangoon
overview: Julia travels to the Indo-Burma border to perform for the troops during the World War II, on the insistence of Billimoria, her lover. She finds herself in love with Jemadar Malik, a soldier there.
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Kangana Ranaut, Saif Ali Khan, Richard McCabe, Alex Avery

title: Baghban
overview: After dedicating their whole life in upbringing their children, elderly couple Raj Malhotra and Pooja gets homeless. Instead of caring, their children treat them as a burden.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Hema Malini, Salman Khan, Mahima Chaudhry, Paresh Rawal

title: Chachi 420
overview: In order to see his little girl more often, a divorcee disguises himself as an old lady and gets a job as his own daughter's caretaker. A Hindi remake of the 1996 Tamil film "Avvai Shanmugi," which is itself a remake of the Hollywood film "Mrs. Doubtfire."
cast: Kamal Haasan, Om Puri, Johnny Walker, Paresh Rawal, Ayesha Jhulka

title: Poster Boys
overview: Life of three men comes in trouble when their photos appear on advertisement for sterilization.
cast: Sunny Deol, Bobby Deol, Shreyas Talpade, Randheer Rai, Sonali Kulkarni

title: Parineeta
overview: Childhood sweethearts Lalita and Shekhar wish to get married someday. However, Shekhar's growing suspicions about Lalita coupled with his conniving father's antics threaten to tear them apart.
cast: Saif Ali Khan, Vidya Balan, Sanjay Dutt, Sabyasachi Chakraborty, Raima Sen

title: Shootout at Lokhandwala
overview: On a calm summer day in 1991, in the bustling Lokhandwala Complex, five criminals including Maya and Dilip were counting 70 lakhs in flat no. 32 B, when 286 policemen, headed by ACP Khan, took strategic positions around their building. A gunfire ensued and the entire nation witnessed the most talked about daylight encounter lasting 6 hours that transformed suburban Mumbai into a war zone.
cast: Vivek Oberoi, Sanjay Dutt, Suniel Shetty, Tusshar Kapoor, Rohit Roy

title: Angrezi Medium
overview: When his daughter decides to further her studies in London, a hardworking Haryanvi businessman does everything in power to make her dreams come true.
cast: Irrfan Khan, Radhikka Madan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Dimple Kapadia, Pankaj Tripathi

title: Meenakshi Sundareshwar
overview: Forced to live apart due to a unique job prospect, two newlyweds face the hassles, hiccups — and hilarity — that arise from their long-distance marriage.
cast: Sanya Malhotra, Abhimanyu Dasani, Purnendu Bhattacharya, Shivkumar Subramaniam, Mahesh Pillai

title: Bhediya
overview: Inspired by legendary folklore rooted in Arunachal Pradesh, Bhediya tells the story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a mythical wolf and begins to transform into the creature himself. As Bhaskar and his ragtag buddies try to find answers, he is worried that the monster in him will wipe out human existence in the local town.
cast: Varun Dhawan, Kriti Sanon, Abhishek Banerjee, Paalin Kabak, Deepak Dobriyal

title: Ladies vs Ricky Bahl
overview: A smooth and charming conman, Ricky Bahl, cons girls for a living but finally meets his match is this fun-filled "ROM-CON."
cast: Ranveer Singh, Anushka Sharma, Parineeti Chopra, Dippanita Sharma, Aditi Sharma

title: Mann
overview: A young woman falls in love with a handsome playboy, while aboard a Singapore to India cruise. They make plans to meet again, but fate may have other plans...
cast: Aamir Khan, Manisha Koirala, Sharmila Tagore, Anil Kapoor, Dalip Tahil

title: Durgamati: The Myth
overview: In the skullduggery world of politics and crime, an innocent Chanchal has to pull all on the line to prove her innocence and bring justice to Shakti and the people that he loved so much. As she gets embroiled deep in a web of deceit, Chanchal must face powers both natural and supernatural to fulfill her destiny.
cast: Bhumi Pednekar, Arshad Warsi, Mahie Gill, Karan Kapadia, Jisshu Sengupta

title: Mumbai Saga
overview: The film, set in the 1980s and 90s, chronicles the transformation of Bombay to Mumbai. The story is a cat and mouse game between a deadly don, Amartya Rao, who doesn’t think twice before killing, and there’s nobody who could stop him and a cop, who is dogging his every step.
cast: John Abraham, Emraan Hashmi, Suniel Shetty, Kajal Aggarwal, Prateik Smita Patil

title: Beiimaan Love
overview: A  young and ambitious woman's life suddenly comes crashing down when she is betrayed in love. Determined to get revenge she reinvents herself as a successful businesswoman.
cast: Sunny Leone, Rajneesh Duggal, Daniel Weber, Rajeev Verma

title: A Thursday
overview: When a kindergarten teacher takes her 16 students hostage and makes a set of demands, it not only rattles the Mumbai police and the city but also sends shockwaves through the country and its leaders as the motive behind the hostage situation is unearthed.
cast: Yami Gautam Dhar, Atul Kulkarni, Neha Dhupia, Dimple Kapadia, Karanvir Sharma

title: Jaadugar
overview: A small-time magician with zero interest in football must lead his local team to the finals of a tournament if he wishes to marry the love of his life.
cast: Jitendra Kumar, Arushi Sharma, Javed Jaffrey, Manoj Joshi, Rukshar Dhillon

title: Phobia
overview: A talented artist tries to curb her phobia of being in public places, only to be convinced that a malevolent spirit is haunting her.
cast: Radhika Apte, Satyadeep Misra, Ankur Vikal, Amrita Bagchi, Nivedita Bhattacharya

title: Dhamaal
overview: Four friends meet an underworld don who, on his deathbed, clues them in on hidden treasure buried in Goa. The group race towards Goa, not knowing that their plans will soon be foiled, albeit hilariously, by a police officer, who is also after the money.
cast: Riteish Deshmukh, Arshad Warsi, Javed Jaffrey, Aashish Chaudhary, Sanjay Dutt

title: Phir Hera Pheri
overview: Raju,  Shyam and Baburao are living happily after having risen from rags to riches. However, they lose it all after falling victim to a chit fund scam due to their greed for more money. Soon, they find themselves in new mess and encounter eccentric and dangerous characters in their quest for a shortcut to riches again.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Suniel Shetty, Paresh Rawal, Bipasha Basu, Rimi Sen

title: Anek
overview: Amid the turmoil in northeast India, an undercover agent tasked with peace negotiations crosses paths with a tenacious boxer fighting for her dreams.
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Andrea Kevichusa, Manoj Pahwa, Kumud Mishra, J. D. Chakravarthi

title: Ek Main Aur Ekk Tu
overview: Rahul and Riana meet each other for the first time, get drunk, and awake the next morning to find that they have gotten legally married to each other.
cast: Imran Khan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Boman Irani, Rob Darren, Ratna Pathak Shah

title: 36 China Town
overview: An inspector heads to 36 China Town to investigate a murder, where every suspect is hiding a secret.
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Akshaye Khanna, Paresh Rawal, Johny Lever

title: Trapped
overview: A man gets stuck in an empty high rise without food, water or electricity.
cast: Rajkummar Rao, Geetanjali Thapa, Khushboo Upadhyay

title: Ganapath
overview: In a dystopian future, Ganapath, a relentless and skilled vigilante, embarks on a mission to dismantle a powerful criminal empire that has gripped the city in fear. Ganapath becomes a symbol of hope for the oppressed in which leads dark.
cast: Tiger Shroff, Kriti Sanon, Amitabh Bachchan, Rahman, Elli Avram

title: Welcome Back
overview: A pair of reformed gangsters try to find a husband for their newly discovered sister, but complications arise due to mistaken identities.
cast: John Abraham, Shruti Haasan, Anil Kapoor, Nana Patekar, Dimple Kapadia

title: Doctor G
overview: Uday Gupta, a medical college student wanted to specialise in Orthopaedic, but is stuck in an all-female class of Gynaecology. Will he change his department, or will the department change him?
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Rakul Preet Singh, Shefali Shah, Sheeba Chaddha, Abhay Chintamani Mishr

title: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!
overview: Byomkesh, fresh out of college, agrees to investigate the disappearance of Bhuvan, a chemist. Assisted by Bhuvan's son Ajit, Byomkesh links the case to a larger conspiracy that will unsettle Calcutta.
cast: Sushant Singh Rajput, Anand Tiwari, Neeraj Kabi, Swastika Mukherjee, Divya Menon

title: No One Killed Jessica
overview: The true story of model Jessica Lall who was shot dead in a restaurant and the campaign to bring her killer to justice.
cast: Rani Mukerji, Vidya Balan, Myra Karn, Neil Bhoopalam, Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub

title: Garam Masala
overview: Photographer and serial womaniser, Mac devises a scheme to keep three airhostesses, who are unaware of each other, as  his live-in partners. Everything works fine as long as they only come home every third day. But changing schedules, a jealous friend and his fiancé might just break apart his elaborately structured life of deceit.
cast: Akshay Kumar, John Abraham, Paresh Rawal, Daisy Bopanna, Nargis Bagheri

title: Duplicate
overview: Seeking vengeance on those who double-crossed him, an escaped prisoner impersonates an unsuspecting chef.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Juhi Chawla Mehta, Sonali Bendre, Mohnish Behl, Tiku Talsania

title: Raincoat
overview: Tells the story of two lovers, separated by destiny, who meet again one day. This encounter allows each to realize the truth about the lives they are living.
cast: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Ajay Devgn, Annu Kapoor, Mouli Ganguly, Pradip Adhikari

title: Operation Romeo
overview: Aditya Sharma and Neha Kasliwal are in a relationship which finds itself challenged one night when they’re out on a date and get harassed in the dead of the night by two men posing as policemen. Will the night change the course of their relationship?
cast: Sidhant Gupta, Vedika Pinto, Sharad Kelkar, Bhumika Chawla, Kishore Kadam

title: Section 375
overview: A filmmaker stands trial when a costume assistant on his movie accuses him of rape.
cast: Akshaye Khanna, Richa Chadha, Meera Chopra, Rahul Bhat, Shriswara Dubey

title: Manorama Six Feet Under
overview: Satyaveer is an engineer suspended for allegedly accepting a bribe. However, Satyaveer, proud author of a tawdry and thoroughly unsuccessful crime novel, is approached by a woman named Manorama to investigate her husband, whom she suspects of having an affair.
cast: Abhay Deol, Gul Panag, Raima Sen, Vinay Pathak, Sarika

title: Chalte Chalte
overview: A man pursues a woman who is already engaged and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a bitter separation that threatens to destroy their relationship forever.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Rani Mukerji, Jas Arora, Satish Shah, Jayshree Talpade

title: Fashion
overview: A small-town girl finally realizes her dream of becoming a famous supermodel but soon finds out that there's a price for her glamorous new life.
cast: Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Kangana Ranaut, Mugdha Godse, Arjan Bajwa, Samir Soni

title: Mahabharat
overview: Mahabharat is considered as the greatest and the longest epic in world literature It has all the possible elements that a story could have - conflict, duty, sacrifice, heroism, truth, justice, romance, adventure, fantasy and relationships - making it truly an all-encompassing fascinating saga.
cast: Shatrughan Sinha, Amitabh Bachchan, Ajay Devgn, Sunny Deol, Manoj Bajpayee

title: Dybbuk
overview: Mahi, a newly married woman, brings an antique Jewish box into her home. When Mahi and her husband Sam begin to have paranormal experiences, they soon learn that the box is a dybbuk containing an evil spirit. The couple then seeks the help of a rabbi to unravel its mystery. Will they survive this ordeal before their child is born?
cast: Emraan Hashmi, Nikita Dutta, Manav Kaul, Denzil Smith, Anil George

title: Hisss
overview: After being diagnosed with brain cancer, a desperate American man kidnaps the reptilian lover of the snake goddess in hopes of gaining immortality.
cast: Mallika Sherawat, Irrfan Khan, Jeff Doucette, Divya Dutta, Raman Trikha

title: Vaah! Life Ho Toh Aisi!
overview: As the only employed member of a large family, Aditya Singh a big-hearted mechanic, works hard to provide for his siblings, his grandmother and a bevy of nieces and nephews. But, when he is unexpectedly killed in a car accident, his family's future becomes a murky prospect. Fearful for their safety and happiness, Aditya convinces Yamraj the Hindu god of death, to give him a chance to return -- as a ghost -- to carry out the unresolved business of his life.
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Sanjay Dutt, Amrita Rao, Arshad Warsi, Prem Chopra

title: Zeher
overview: Siddharth and Sonia are happily married until Anna walks into Siddharth's life. Things go from bad to worse, when Anna gets killed and Siddharth finds himself sinking in troubled waters.
cast: Emraan Hashmi, Shamita Shetty, Udita Goswami, Sameer Kochhar, Ninad Kamat

title: Bawaal
overview: Ajay Dixit, an ordinary history teacher in a high school, enjoys mini celebrityhood in his town courtesy of the fake image he has built. He shares a strained relationship with his newly-wed wife. Circumstances force him to take a trip to Europe for the World War II trail accompanied by his wife. Will his relationship with his wife survive this trip? Will he manage to win the war within?
cast: Varun Dhawan, Janhvi Kapoor, Manoj Pahwa, Anjuman Saxena, Prateek Pachori

title: Befikre
overview: What starts as a crazy one-night stand ends up in a relationship. But Dharam and Shyra fall out of love just as quickly. Where will life take them now?
cast: Ranveer Singh, Vaani Kapoor, Elisa Bachir Bey, Julie Ordon, Marinelly Vaslon

title: Gold
overview: Set in 1948, the historic story of India's first Olympic medal post their independence.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Mouni Roy, Kumud Pant, Kunal Kapoor, Amit Sadh

title: Thank You For Coming
overview: Opting for a stable fiancé over genuine romance, a food blogger experiences sexual satisfaction for the first time at her engagement party. However, she must find out who her mysterious lover is.
cast: Bhumi Pednekar, Dolly Singh, Shibani Bedi, Natasha Rastogi, Dolly Ahluwalia

title: The Journey of Karma
overview: A girl from the slum whose only dream is to work aboard travels through her journey full of twist n turns, surprises, lust with a mysterious old man.
cast: Poonam Pandey, Shakti Kapoor

title: Andaaz
overview: Young Raj Malhotra lives with his elder brother, Rohit; his sister-in-law Kiran, and a niece. After an accident fractures his leg, he is unable to walk for some time. Due to psychological reasons, he cannot walk even after the fracture heals. When the Malhotras move to Dehra Dun, Raj befriends young Kajal, as both share a common passion for airplanes. Kajal encourages Raj to walk, and succeeds. Years later the two continue to be fast friends, and everyone expects them to marry soon. Then Raj is recruited by the Indian Air Force and goes for training for a year and a half. After his training gets over, he rushes to Kajal to propose to her, only to find out that she has given her heart to a multimillionaire, Karan Singhania (Verma), who owns several airplanes and choppers. Raj congratulates Kajal and Karan, but does not reveal his true feelings.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Lara Dutta, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Rajeev Verma, Pankaj Dheer

title: Neal 'n' Nikki
overview: During a 21-day bachelor trip before his wedding, Neal falls in love with Nikki, a woman he slept with. Things get further complicated when Nikki turns out to be his fiancee's cousin.
cast: Uday Chopra, Tanishaa Mukerji, Abhishek Bachchan, Richa Pallod, Gaurav Gera

title: Ram Setu
overview: An atheist archaeologist turned believer must race against time to prove the true existence of the legendary Ram Setu before evil forces destroy the pillar of India’s heritage.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Jacqueline Fernandez, Satyadev Kancharana, Nushrratt Bharuccha, Nassar

title: Bandit Queen
overview: Born a lower-caste girl in rural India's patriarchal society, "married" at 11, repeatedly raped and brutalized, Phoolan Devi finds freedom only as an avenging warrior, the eponymous Bandit Queen. Devi becomes a kind a bloody Robin Hood; this extraordinary biographical film offers both a vivid portrait of a driven woman and a savage critique of the society that made her.
cast: Seema Biswas, Nirmal Pandey, Rajesh Vivek, Raghubir Yadav, Aditya Srivastava

title: Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana
overview: Satyendra aka Sattu and Aarti meet for a proposed arranged marriage and fall in love in the process. On the night of their marriage, an unexpected turn of events turns their world upside down. Set in the backdrop of India's civil services, Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana explores the challenges that Satyendra and Aarti face as a middle-class couple in India.
cast: Rajkummar Rao, Kriti Kharbanda, Navni Parihar, Govind Namdeo, Nayani Dixit

title: Raksha Bandhan
overview: Lala Kedarnath is blessed with 4 sisters. But his only worry is to find suitable grooms for each of them, as only then can he marry his childhood love. To what lengths will he go to succeed?
cast: Akshay Kumar, Bhumi Pednekar, Sadia Khateeb, Sahejmeen Kaur, Smrithi Srikanth

title: Shivaay
overview: Shivaay , a fearless Himalayan mountaineer covered in Lord Shiva tattoos, heads to Bulgaria to fulfill his nine-year-old daughter Gaura’s  wish of seeing her mother Olga, who abandoned them years ago. But their plan goes for a toss when the little girl gets kidnapped in the foreign land. Rescuing her from the masked child-traffickers becomes his only reason for survival.
cast: Ajay Devgn, Abigail Eames, Erika Kaar, Sayesha Saigal, Ali Kazmi

title: Unpaused
overview: An anthology that brings five unique creators and filmmakers to tell stories about love, happiness, friendship, new beginnings, second chances and a glimmer of hope - set and filmed in the times of the COVID-19 lockdown.
cast: Gulshan Devaiah, Saiyami Kher, Richa Chadha, Ishwak Singh, Sumeet Vyas

title: Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam
overview: Radha and Suraj have been friends since childhood. Gopal has been in love with Radha ever since they spent a few years together as kids. Years later, Gopal's guardian proposes to Radha a marriage with Gopal, and she accepts.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Madhuri Dixit, Atul Agnihotri, Suman Ranganathan

title: Ascharya Fuck It
overview: Desire and greed intertwines the lives of a Bollywood star, his chauffeur, a prostitute and her pimp in an unlikely love story.
cast: Priyanka Bose, Vaibhav Raj Gupta, Ankit Raaj, Anangsha Biswas, Santosh Juvekar

title: Chehre
overview: An ad agency executive takes shelter at an old man's home in mountains amid a dangerous snow storm, but soon finds himself trapped with no way out when the man and his clan of veterans hook him for a game of crime and punishment.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Emraan Hashmi, Krystle D'Souza, Annu Kapoor, Rhea Chakraborty

title: Khoon Bhari Maang
overview: Nandini and Sanjay Verma are lovers, and they conspire to take over the vaste estate of Mr. Saxena and his only widowed daughter, Aarti, and her two children, with the help of Sanjay's maternal uncle Heeralal, a longtime employee of Saxena. After Saxena passes away suddenly, Sanjay woes Aarti and marries her. On a boating trip both Nandini and Sanjay do away with Aarti, making it look like an accident, and subsequently take over the entire Saxena estate. But Aarti survives, disfigured beyond recognition by a crocodile attack, With the help of plastic surgery transforms herself to a successful model, Jyoti. She then plans to carry out her vengeance against Sanjay, but finds that he has been physically abusing her children, pets, and servants. She must now decide to reveal her identity, or continue with her plan and be a spectator to the abuse on her loved ones. Written by rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)
cast: Rekha, Kabir Bedi, Sonu Walia, Kader Khan, Satyajeet Puri

title: Border
overview: Amidst the 1971 Indo-Pak war, a company of 120 Indian soldiers stationed at the border region of Longewala in Rajasthan must defend their post through the night against two thousand Pakistani troops armed with tanks. Based on the true events of the Battle of Longewala.
cast: Sunny Deol, Jackie Shroff, Suniel Shetty, Akshaye Khanna, Puneet Issar

title: Singh Is Bliing
overview: Raftaar Singh is always looking to have fun and runs away from responsibility. Fed up, his father orders Raftaar to go to Goa and work, and learn to take on responsibility. Once in Goa, he impresses his new boss with his enthusiasm and creative thinking. Soon he gets an assignment, and meets Sara Amy Jackson - and thus begins their unique love story. What ensues is a great comedy of errors, as one hilarious situation after another unfolds. Raftaar falls head over heels for this exotic, mysterious girl. The romance takes a deadly turn when he realizes that Sara is not who he thinks she is and has an agenda, which takes him to Romania. Will Raftaar be able to win her over in a distant and dangerous land?
cast: Akshay Kumar, Amy Jackson, Rati Agnihotri, Lara Dutta, Kay Kay Menon

title: No Entry
overview: Kishan has always been faithful to his wife, Kaajal, who constantly suspects him of having affairs. Meanwhile, Kishan's friend Prem frequently cheats on his doting wife, Pooja, without getting caught, incurring the disapproval of Kishan and photographer Sunny. Tired of listening to his moralistic pals, Prem introduces Kishan to Bobby, an attractive escort.
cast: Anil Kapoor, Salman Khan, Fardeen Khan, Bipasha Basu, Lara Dutta

title: Bombay Rose
overview: Amidst the bustle of a magnetic and multifaceted city, the budding love between two dreamers is tested by duty and religious divides.
cast: Cyli Khare, Amit Deondi, Gargi Shitole, Makrand Deshpande, Amardeep Jha

title: LSD: Love, Sex aur Dhokha
overview: A video camcorder, a store security camera, and concealed cameras candidly expose lives in three loosely linked tales.
cast: Anshuman Jha, Nushrratt Bharuccha, Rajkummar Rao, Neha Chauhan, Amit Sial

title: Vikram Vedha
overview: Vikram, an honest officer with the Lucknow police, is on a mission to find and eliminate gangster Vedha. However, when Vedha surrenders himself to the police and starts narrating stories to Vikram, it blurs the lines between good and evil. Vedha questions Vikram's righteousness while the latter believes he is fair and just. But is he?
cast: Saif Ali Khan, Hrithik Roshan, Radhika Apte, Rohit Saraf, Yogita Bihani

title: Karwaan
overview: Avinash, a dejected soul stuck in a dead-end job shares a strange relationship with his father. He holds him responsible for crushing his dreams. However, he is left pondering upon this longstanding hatred when he hears of his father’s untimely demise.
cast: Dulquer Salmaan, Mithila Palkar, Irrfan Khan, Kriti Kharbanda, Amala Akkineni

title: Jalebi
overview: An estranged couple happen to meet on a train journey where they independently reflect on what went wrong in their relationship and whether they will truly be able to move forward and start a new chapter, together or alone.
cast: Rhea Chakraborty, Varun Mitra, Digangana Suryavanshi, Praveena Deshpande, Aanya Dureja

title: An Action Hero
overview: At the age of just 30, Maanav at the peak of his acting career gets caught up in a murder accusation, which turns his own life into an eccentric action thriller as he flees the country, with a vengeful politician hot on his heels.
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Jaideep Ahlawat, Gautam Joglekar, Harsh Chhaya, Neeraj Madhav

title: Attack
overview: With the Parliament under siege, India’s first super soldier Arjun Shergill is tasked to get hold of the terrorists in time, save the Prime Minister from their clutches and stop a dirty bomb from exploding and destroying Delhi.
cast: John Abraham, Serena Walia, Rakul Preet Singh, Prakash Raj, Ratna Pathak Shah

title: Rang Rasiya
overview: A look a the life of 19th century Indian painter Raja Ravi Varma.
cast: Randeep Hooda, Nandana Sen, Paresh Rawal, Rashaana Shah, Ashish Vidhyarthi

title: Gori Tere Pyaar Mein
overview: Sriram Venkat is the most shallow guy on earth who doesn't value relationships, family, friends, life or the country. Not necessarily in that order. Because he couldn't care less about the order. This makes him the clear 'black' sheep of the family.
cast: Kareena Kapoor Khan, Imran Khan, Anupam Kher, Nizhalgal Ravi, Kalyani Natarajan

title: Jism 2
overview: A porn star is hired by a dashing intelligence officer as a 'honey-trap' for a dreaded assassin. She not only has to confront her bitter-sweet past, but is also forced to make an impossible choice - one that will put her own life in jeopardy.

title: Good Newwz
overview: Two couples with the same surnames pursue in-vitro fertilisation and wait for their upcoming babies. Trouble ensues when they find that the sperms of each couple have been mixed with each other.

title: Talaash: The Hunt Begins
overview: Babu works for three underworld dons and must go to prison to protect them. When his sentence is over, he returns home to find that Purnima (his wife), Arjun (his son) and Pooja (his daughter) live a destitute life. When he confronts his bosses, he is beheaded in front of his wife and children, and his daughter is abducted.  Purnima (Raakhee) loses her mind, and is hospitalized in a mental hospital. Growing up, Arjun (Akshay Kumar) becomes a high profile vigilante. As for Purnima, she becomes terribly ill and can be saved only if she sees her daughter again. Thus, Arjun decides to re-unite his mother and sister. In order to do so, he must discover the identity of his father's killers.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Gulshan Grover, Shakti Kapoor, Rakhee Gulzar

title: Agneepath
overview: A young boy's father is lynched before his eyes; fifteen years later he returns home for revenge.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Mithun Chakraborty, Danny Denzongpa, Madhavi, Neelam Kothari

title: Bhoothnath Returns
overview: Boothnath vows to redeem himself when spirits tease him, and searches for a child to terrify. He befriends Akhrot, a slum kid, and helps him take on the country's most powerful politician.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Parth Bhalerao, Boman Irani, Usha Jadhav, Sanjay Mishra

title: Halla Bol
overview: Ashfaque (Ajay Devgan) is a small town boy aspiring to be a film star in the Hindi film industry. He joins a street theatre group run by a reformed dacoit Sidhu (Pankaj Kapur) who uses street theatre as a medium to bring about an awakening in the masses. Ashfaque struggles to give a creative vent to the actor in him in order to realize his dreams.
cast: Ajay Devgn, Vidya Balan, Pankaj Kapur, Sana Khaan, Darshan Jariwala

title: Fukrey
overview: The paths of four dream-chasing college friends cross with an array of colourful characters, from a tough-talking Punjabi female don to a Jugaad Baaz college watchman. Mayhem ensues.

title: Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak
overview: Both Dhanraj Singh and Randhir Singh are two bitter and old time enemies. They faced a disastrous situation when their children, Raj and Rashmi fall deeply in love. They openly declare their hatred for one another and will do anything in their power, even kill - but they will not accept their children's choice. But Raj and Rashmi are dedicated to their love and are not willing to accept the fact that their fathers are mutual enemies.
cast: Aamir Khan, Juhi Chawla Mehta, Dalip Tahil, Ravindra Kapoor, Faisal Hussain Khan

title: Action Jackson
overview: A man meets his lookalike, who's not just a killer of evil, but also a kind hearted man. Together, they team up to fight against a dreaded gangster.
cast: Ajay Devgn, Manasvi Mamgai, Byron Gibson, Sonakshi Sinha, Yami Gautam Dhar

title: Chhota Bheem Kung Fu Dhamaka
overview: Chhota Bheem and his friends decide to participate in the annual martial arts competition held at China, where the country's princess gets kidnapped by an evil demon Zuhu.

title: Besharam

He has no sense of right or wrong till he unwittingly hurts the love of his life, Tara. Babli realizes that there is no right way of doing the wrong thing. Babli sets out to fix all the wrongs in his life and he continues to be shameless about it.
cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Pallavi Sharda, Rishi Kapoor, Neetu Singh, Amitosh Nagpal

title: Apurva

cast: Tara Sutaria, Dhairya Karwa, Abhishek Banerjee, Rajpal Yadav, Sumit Gulati

title: Shakti: The Power

title: Dum Maaro Dum

cast: Abhishek Bachchan, Bipasha Basu, Rana Daggubati, Prateik Smita Patil, Aditya Pancholi

title: The Hungry
overview: Tulsi Joshi, a widow and bride to be comes to her own wedding seeking revenge for the brutal murder of her first born son.
cast: Naseeruddin Shah, Tisca Chopra, Neeraj Kabi, Arjun Gupta, Sayani Gupta

overview: The Tashkent Files is a thriller that revolves around the mysterious death of India's 2nd Prime Minister Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri and attempts to uncover if he had actually died a natural death, or, as alleged, was assassinated.

title: Missing
overview: A couple checks into a beach resort in Mauritius late night with their three-year-old daughter Titli who in the next morning goes missing.

Since only DSP D'Silva knows of this incident, he recruits Vijay, who is a spitting image of Don, to replace the original Don and infiltrate his gang. D'Silva plans to nab the entire gang, but when he dies during a raid, the secret that Vijay is not Don is also buried with him.

title: Marjaavaan
overview: Raghu and Zoya are enjoying their lives together until a gang leader with harmful intentions turns their world upside down.

title: Guzaarish
overview: Ethan, a magician rendered paralyzed in an accident, sets off a furor when he makes a petition to the court to end his own life.
cast: Hrithik Roshan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Shernaz Patel, Aditya Roy Kapur, Suhel Seth

title: Raabta
overview: An inseparable couple Saira and Shiva find themselves in a complicated situation when a stranger claims to be her reincarnated lover from their previous lifetime, hellbent on destroying their relationship and winning her back.

title: Mary Kom
overview: A chronicle of the life of Indian boxer 'Mary Kom' who went through several hardships before audaciously accomplishing her ultimate dream.

title: Aiyaary

overview: A man cheats on his wife with his secretary, but things take a haunting shift after he accidentally kills his mistress.

title: Yodha
overview: When terrorists hijack a passenger plane, a suspended commando onboard under mysterious circumstances, crafts a plan to thwart the hijackers and safeguard the passengers' survival despite the engine's failure.

title: Thappad
overview: A young woman's life is shattered into pieces when her husband slaps her at a party, causing her to question what this relationship stands for.

title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
overview: The life of three friends takes a tragic turn due to an inflated electricity bill, which leads to a courtroom drama and social awakening.

overview: This spoof comedy narrates the story of a cop Arjun Patiala and his sidekick Onidda Singh. Together, will they be able to accomplish their mission of a crime-free town with their goofy style of policing?

Deep enjoys a stable life with his wife, Shanti, and young daughter, but faces pressures from a demanding job, a quirky client, and a meddlesome mother-in-law. Rishi, on the other hand, is grappling with a failing marriage to his headstrong wife, Nicki, and the emotional toll of living apart.  When Neel, a talented guitarist with his own romantic troubles, joins their advertising agency, he becomes an unlikely ally. Together, the trio juggles work chaos, relationship conflicts, and their unyielding dream of winning the competition. Set against a backdrop of music, camaraderie, and laughter, their journey is one of self-discovery, forgiveness, and the pursuit of harmony both on and off the stage.

title: Blackmail
overview: When Dev finds about his wife's affair, he starts blackmailing her and her lover but the blackmail game backfires on him.
cast: Irrfan Khan, Kirti Kulhari, Arunoday Singh, Divya Dutta, Omi Vaidya

title: Barsaat
overview: A village boy named Badal, is attracted towards his classmate Tina, who belongs to a rich family. However, her father disapproves of their relationship and gets him arrested under false charges.

title: Badhaai Ho
overview: A 25-year-old man tries to suppress his embarrassment when his mother announces that she is pregnant.
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Neena Gupta, Gajraj Rao, Sanya Malhotra, Surekha Sikri

overview: Two friends and their sweet and endearing misadventures and one of these misadventures sees them land in the middle of a kidnapping investigation.

overview: Siya appears to be the bone of contention between warring businessmen Aditya and Saurav. But this one runs deeper than your average love triangle.

title: Ungli

title: Gumraah
overview: A murder investigation becomes complicated after the cops discover a pair of lookalike suspects.
cast: Aditya Roy Kapur, Mrunal Thakur, Ronit Roy, Vedika Pinto, Keeya Khanna

overview: Six newly-married, diverse, honeymooning couples face marital bliss and discord, finding out more about themselves, their significant others and life in this happy-go-lucky, quirky drama.

title: Chillar Party
overview: A gang of innocent but feisty kids who lead carefree lives in Chandan Nagar colony, take on the big bad world of politics when one of their friend's life is endangered.

title: Phantom
overview: Phantom is an action thriller that unfolds across various countries around the world. The plot revolves around protagonist Daniyal, whose journey to seek justice takes him from India to Europe, America and the volatile Middle East. However, he finds out that in a mission like this, there is always a price to pay, in this case, a very personal price.

title: Badhaai Do
overview: A gay cop and a lesbian teacher enter a sham marriage to pacify their families but find that relationships — both real and fake — aren't all that easy.

title: Masoom
overview: A loving husband and father's joyful family life is rocked to its core upon the discovery that he has a young son borne from a past extramarital affair.

title: Malamaal Weekly
overview: After one of his customers dies from the shock of winning a lottery, lottery ticket seller Lilaram hatches a plan to have that money all for himself. But others from the village have also got their eyes on the money.

title: Dolly Kitty and Those Twinkling Stars
overview: A disillusioned Delhi wife (Dolly), and her new-in-town cousin (Kitty), navigate damning secrets, dreams and their thorny dynamic on their respective roads to freedom.
cast: Konkona Sen Sharma, Bhumi Pednekar, Aamir Bashir, Vikrant Massey, Amol Parashar

title: Shamitabh
overview: A mute, aspiring actor joins forces with a man who has a powerful voice. Together they take the film industry by storm, but will their egos get in the way?

title: Lakeer
genre: Action, Drama, Romance, Action, Drama, Romance
overview: Gangster and criminal Don, Suraj Rana, who is also known for his kindness, adopts a street urchin named Arjun, and teaches him all the tricks of the trade, so that he can succeed him, even though he has a son named Karan. Arjun and Karan grow up as brothers, and Arjun takes charge of all criminal activities after Suraj passes away. Karan has fallen in love with Bindiya, the daughter of Suraj's deceased employee, and would like her to marry him. But Bindiya is in love with Saahil, and only likes Karan. Karan now decides to take the matter into his own hands, and thereby force Arjun to take sides either for him or against him.
cast: Sunny Deol, Suniel Shetty, Sohail Khan, John Abraham, Nauheed Cyrusi

title: The Chess Players
overview: In the year 1856, Nawab Wajid Ali Shah is the King of Awadh, one of the last independent kingdoms of India. The British intend to control this rich land and send General Outram to clear way for an annexation. Pressure is mounting amidst intrigue and political maneuvers, but the Nawab whiles away his time in pursuit of pleasure and religious practice. The court is of no help either — noblemen Mir and Mirza ignore all duties and spend their days playing endless games of chess. Based on Munshi Premchand's short story of the same name.  Preserved by the Academy Film Archive in partnership with The Film Foundation in 2010.
cast: Sanjeev Kumar, Saeed Jaffrey, Amjad Khan, Shabana Azmi, Farida Jalal

title: Ramayana: The Legend of Prince Rama
overview: In Ayodhya, the royal palace of Kosala Kingdom in Ancient India, four princes were born to three queens, each of whom grew to great stature. Banished for 14 years due to court intrigue, Prince Rama retreated to the forest with his beautiful wife Sita. When Rama vanquishes the demons of the forest, he invites the wrath of the demon king Ravana, who kidnaps Sita. Based on the Indian epic the Ramayana.
cast: Nikhil Kapoor, Raell Padamsee, Uday Mathan, Mishal Verma, Noel Godin

title: Bhoomi
overview: A shoe-smith Arun Sachdeva is shattered when he discovers that his daughter, Bhoomi has been raped by Dhauli and his gang of three. The father and daughter grieve for a bit before planning revenge.

title: Yes Boss
overview: Rahul Joshi wants to be a successful businessman so he works hard for his boss Siddharth. One day Rahul meets Seema, an up and coming model, and he feels like he's finally met his match. Will Seema fall for Rahul?

title: The Big Bull

All is normal in their lives until destiny throws free-spirited Disha into the mix. What follows is a game of defiance, deception and love.

overview: Paan Singh Tomar goes from celebrated runner to star brigand and rebel when life after sports fails to unfold as planned.

title: Bell Bottom
overview: By the early ‘80s, India had already witnessed multiple airplane hijacks. In 1984, the country was made to face another such challenge. BellBottom, a RAW Agent, sees through the plan and thus begins India's first overseas covert operation. An operation, lead by a forgotten hero, that went on to create one of the most defining moments for India.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Huma Qureshi, Adil Hussain, Lara Dutta, Vaani Kapoor

title: Angry Indian Goddesses
overview: A photographer invites her closest friends to vacation at her family's home in Goa in celebration of her upcoming marriage.

title: Virasat
overview: After completing his studies in London, England, Shakti Thakur returns home to India in a small town where his family resides.
cast: Anil Kapoor, Tabu, Amrish Puri, Pooja Batra, Milind Gunaji

title: Hulchul
overview: A man and woman from feuding families each pretend to fall in love, as part of a revenge plot. Chaos ensues when their fake romance becomes a reality.

title: Sherni
overview: A jaded forest officer leads a team of trackers and locals intending to capture an unsettled tigress while battling intense obstacles and pressures, both natural and man-made.

overview: A dentist and a henpecked husband finds his life in trouble after getting embroiled in a mafia rivalry.

It is love at first sight for Sachin. However, Jessie is from a strict Malayali Christian family, and her parents would never approve of their romance. The other problem is Jessie insists that she doesn't want a romantic relationship, but wants only to be friends. Of all the girls in the world why did Sachin have to fall for Jessie?

title: Page 3
overview: 'Page 3' takes a behind-the-scenes look at the lifestyles of the A-list celebrities in metro cities. It explores the networking and the power play between the air-kissing
cast: Konkona Sen Sharma, Atul Kulkarni, Sandhya Mridul, Tara Sharma, Boman Irani

title: Matrubhoomi: A Nation Without Women
overview: A woman, attended by two midwives, is giving birth in a small village in India. When the child's cry rings, the father bangs on a steel plate to attract the attention of all the villagers, ...

title: Jannat
overview: A gambler turns into a cricket bookie banking on his sixth sense for the game. But his urge to make quick money pushes him into match-fixing and he loses control of his life and love.

title: Tribhanga
overview: When her estranged mother falls into a coma, a self-made single mom grapples with regret and resentment while reflecting on their strained relationship.

title: Yaariyan 2
overview: As three cousins embrace the warmth of a new city, they also face challenges that transform their lives.

overview: Madhukar and Parthavi fall head over heels in love with each other, but the fact that they belong to different castes of society, becomes an obstacle in their romance. The lovers dare to go against societal norms and battle all odds for the sake of love.

overview: Roy, a professional conman, gets dumped by his girlfriend after she find out the truth about him. After being diagnosed with a fatal disease, he resolves to do some good by helping an amateur conman, Dittu to hoodwink the mobster who hurt his family.

title: Mixed Doubles
overview: Bored with his sex life, a man tries to convince his wife to swap partners.

overview: After an explosion at a chemical factory gives him the power of invisibility, a former officer of the law becomes a vigilante in order to take revenge on those who have wronged him.

overview: Bantu has grown up suffering his father Valmiki’s vitriolic tongue until he discovers that he’s actually an heir to an influential family, who was exchanged at birth. He moves into their mansion to protect them from a criminal drug lord’s attack and helps the family sort their issues.
cast: Kartik Aaryan, Kriti Sanon, Paresh Rawal, Manisha Koirala, Ronit Roy

title: Force
overview: A vengeful drug-dealer/gangster targets and terrorizes an entire police unit and their families.

overview: A man belongs to a middle-class family and is intent on pursuing his career with a music group, despite his dad's disapproval. He is also in love with the lead singer, but she sees him mainly as a friend.

title: Choked: Paisa Bolta Hai
overview: A bank employee weighed down by her jobless husband's debts - and her own broken dreams - finds a secret source of seemingly unlimited cash in her home.

title: Salaam-e-Ishq
overview: Six couples who do not know each other are brought together by destiny, fate and love

title: Dil Bole Hadippa!
overview: Veera, a fire-cracker of a girl who lives in a small village but dreams of playing cricket in the big league. Rohan is an accomplished captain of a county cricket team in England. Rohan returns to India to captain his father's cricket team which has been losing for the last 8 years. In a Village where girls don't play Cricket, Veera has to put on a put on a turban & beard to live her dream.
cast: Rani Mukerji, Shahid Kapoor, Anupam Kher, Dalip Tahil, Rakhi Sawant

title: Sanam Re
overview: A story about the man who is confused with his love life finds solace in his birthplace with his childhood love.
cast: Yami Gautam Dhar, Pulkit Samrat, Urvashi Rautela, Rishi Kapoor, Prachee Shah

title: Main Tera Hero
overview: Seenu loves Sunaina but they're chased by a stalking cop, an infatuated beauty and her mafia don dad - can Seenu's heroics work?
cast: Varun Dhawan, Ileana D'Cruz, Nargis Fakhri, Anupam Kher, Rajpal Yadav

title: All the Best: Fun Begins
overview: In order to increase his monthly allowance, Veer lies to his stepbrother Dharm about being married. When Dharm unexpectedly arrives in Goa, he mistakes Prem's wife for Veer's. This case of mistaken identities leads to chaotic and hilarious situations.
cast: Ajay Devgn, Sanjay Dutt, Fardeen Khan, Bipasha Basu, Mugdha Godse

title: Koi Jaane Na
overview: A heartbroken writer struggling with writer`s block goes to a quiet hill station where he finds love again but uncovers a copycat serial killer who has mysteriously come alive and is killing everyone around him.
cast: Kunal Kapoor, Amyra Dastur, Karim Hajee, Aditi Gowitrikar, Aamir Khan

title: Maqbool
overview: The Scottish tragedy 'Macbeth' set in the contemporary underworld of India's commercial capital; two corrupt, fortune telling policemen take the roles of the weird sisters, and "Duncan" is Abbaji, the head of a crime family.
cast: Irrfan Khan, Tabu, Pankaj Kapur, Om Puri, Naseeruddin Shah

title: Haseena Maan Jaayegi
overview: Separated from their wealthy father and each other, two brothers try to win the hearts of their dream girls.
cast: Govinda, Sanjay Dutt, Karisma Kapoor, Pooja Batra, Kader Khan

title: English Babu Desi Mem
overview: Vikram Mayur is looking after his late brother's eight-year-old son and is torn between choosing to take Nandu back to England to learn his family's business, or risk throwing it all way.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Sonali Bendre, Saeed Jaffrey, Sunny Singh, Rajeshwari Sachdev

title: Shola Aur Shabnam
overview: The spoiled and arrogant brother, Bali, of notorious gangster, Kali Baba, enlists in the National Cadet Corps, and wants to have his way with his fellow-students and trainer, Inder Mohan Lahti, with comical results. When he meets Divya Thapa for the first time, he is smitten by her, and wants to marry her by hook or by crook. But Divya is in love with Karan, and both plan to marry each other. Circumstances act against them, and they flee together, with Kali Baba's men, and Divya's Police Commissioner dad, Yashpal Thapa, in hot pursuit, to an unknown destination, surrounded by a web of lies, deception, and no known resource to assist them.
cast: Govinda, Divya Bharti, Gulshan Grover, Alok Nath, Anupam Kher

title: Bloody Daddy
overview: Sumair Azad, a dirty cop and his friend, Jaggi, steal Sikandar Chowdhary's cocaine bag. As a result, Sikandar kidnaps Sumair's son, but things take a turn when he loses the cocaine bag as he faces off Gurugram’s drug lords, a crime boss, murderous narcs and straight cops on one fateful night.
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Ronit Roy, Rajeev Khandelwal, Diana Penty, Sartaaj Kakkar

title: ABCD
overview: When a capable dancer is provoked by the evil design of his employer, naturally he will be out to prove his mettle.
cast: Prabhu Deva, Ganesh Acharya, Kay Kay Menon, Lauren Gottlieb, Dharmesh Yelande

title: Love Sonia
overview: Inspired by a real story of young girl's journey escape from the world of international sex trafficking.
cast: Mrunal Thakur, Richa Chadha, Freida Pinto, Manoj Bajpayee, Adil Hussain

title: Highway
overview: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.
cast: Alia Bhatt, Randeep Hooda, Durgesh Kumar, Pradeep Nagar, Saharsh Kumar Shukla

title: Pagalpanti
overview: 3 men, considered as losers in their lives by the people, plan to get rich along with their girlfriends by fooling 2 gangsters and robbing their money.
cast: John Abraham, Ileana D'Cruz, Arshad Warsi, Urvashi Rautela, Pulkit Samrat

title: Kishen Kanhaiya
overview: Leela and Bholaram are a childless couple. Leela works as a midwife, and one day assists Sunderdas' wife to give birth to twin boys. She decides to keep one baby for herself, and tells Sunderdas that his wife has given birth to one child. There are complications for the mother, and she passes away without seeing her children. Leela and Bholaram bring up Kanhaiya, while Sunderdas attempts to bring up Kishen, but is unable to do a good job. So he marries Kamini, who comes along with her brother, Ghendamal, to live at the estate. She has an illegitimate child named Ramesh from another man, and when Sunderdas comes to know of this, he is threatened and attacked, and as a result of which he is paralyzed, unable to move.
cast: Anil Kapoor, Amrish Puri, Madhuri Dixit, Kader Khan, Vikas Anand

title: Tejas
overview: Indian Air Force officer Tejas sets out on a dangerous mission to rescue an Indian spy from Pakistan. While she faces the terrorists that come her way, she must also fight the ghosts of her past.
cast: Kangana Ranaut, Anshul Chauhan, Varun Mitra, Ashish Vidhyarthi, Vishak Nair

title: Raaz: The Mystery Continues...
overview: A beautiful lady turns up in an architect's masterpiece.When he founds that she is real, he realizes that she is haunted and hunted by the reasons they have to find out
cast: Emraan Hashmi, Kangana Ranaut, Adhyayan Suman, Jackie Shroff, Dinesh Lamba

title: Satyaprem Ki Katha
overview: A middle-class boy in Ahmedabad, Satyaprem falling in one-sided love with Katha, who is coping with her breakup with Tapan. Through the journey, they discover each other's life and complement in accomplishing what was left halfway.
cast: Kartik Aaryan, Kiara Advani, Gajraj Rao, Supriya Pathak, Siddharth Randeria

title: Jayeshbhai Jordaar
overview: A non-confrontational Jayesh decides to defy his patriarchal family and flee with his pregnant wife Mudra to save their unborn daughter from foeticide. A screwball, hilarious chase begins as Jayesh's father assembles all his might to nab them. Will this unlikely hero manage to create a safe and equal haven for his daughter?
cast: Ranveer Singh, Shalini Pandey, Boman Irani, Ratna Pathak Shah, Jia Vaidya

title: Tumhari Sulu
overview: A happy-go-lucky Mumbai suburban housewife Sulochana, fondly known as Sulu, lands the role of a night RJ, resulting in drastic changes to her routine life.
cast: Vidya Balan, Manav Kaul, Vijay Maurya, Neha Dhupia, Abhishek Sharma

title: Atrangi Re
overview: Runaway Rinku gets forcefully married to already engaged Vishu. Both don't want this marriage and make a deal to go on their separate ways. The equation gets weirder when Rinku's lover Sajjad shows up and Vishu starts developing feelings for her.
cast: Sara Ali Khan, Dhanush, Akshay Kumar, Seema Biswas, Ashish Verma

title: R... Rajkumar
overview: Rajkumar, an aimless youth, works for a drug baron and is sent to kill a rival dealer. His life is changed forever when he meets Chanda, and has no idea she is the adopted daughter of the man he is supposed to kill.
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Sonakshi Sinha, Mukul Dev, Ashish Vidhyarthi, Sonu Sood

title: Mimi
overview: An aspiring actress in a small town in Rajasthan agrees to bear a child for a visiting couple seeking a surrogate mother, but her experience takes an unexpected turn when they refuse to have the child anymore.
cast: Kriti Sanon, Pankaj Tripathi, Sai Tamhankar, Evelyn Edwards, Supriya Pathak

title: Chopsticks
overview: A gifted but insecure woman is in for a transformative experience when she enlists the help of an enigmatic con artist to recover her stolen car.
cast: Mithila Palkar, Abhay Deol, Vijay Raaz, Benafsha Soonawalla, Achint Kaur

title: Jaane Tu... Ya Jaane Na
overview: Two best friends being convinced that they are not in love search for each other's love.
cast: Imran Khan, Genelia D'Souza, Manjari Fadnnis, Prateik Smita Patil, Sugandha Garg

title: Sui Dhaaga - Made in India
overview: Mauji stays in a village near Delhi with his wife Mamta, father and mother. Varun works at a shop that sells sewing machines, owned by Bansal and his son Prashant. Both have a habit of ill-treating Mauji and make him do fun antics. When Prashant gets married, Bansal invites Mauji and his entire family. Mamta feels humiliated when she sees Mauji being asked to imitate a dog by the Bansals.
cast: Varun Dhawan, Anushka Sharma, Raghubir Yadav, Yamini Das, Sawan Tank

title: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
overview: Two zanies open a photography studio. They score a partnership with a gossip magazine that suddenly thrusts them into a world of corruption, murder, and hijinks.
cast: Naseeruddin Shah, Ravi Baswani, Bhakti Barve, Satish Shah, Om Puri

title: Kyun...! Ho Gaya Na
overview: A man and a woman have opposing beliefs about love. He sees her as a friend, but she is in love with him. When the woman decides to marry someone else, the man is left with a heavy heart and wonders if this is what love feels like.
cast: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Vivek Oberoi, Amitabh Bachchan, Suniel Shetty, Om Puri

title: Hate Story 2
overview: A young photographer from Mumbai uses her mind to play games with a prominent Hindu rightist leader.
cast: Sushant Singh, Surveen Chawla, Jay Bhanushali, Siddharth Kher, Rajesh Khera

title: Sawaal
overview: Seth Dhanpath Rai (Sanjeev Kumar) is the country's most powerful smuggler who is surrounded by his fortress of power and money. Then one fine day, his daughter Sonia (Poonam Dhillon) falls in love with Ravi Malhotra (Shashi Kapoor), a police officer and wants to marry him. Dhanpath Rai very soon realizes that his son Vicky (Randhir Kapoor) has also taken a path that goes against the one he travels. Vicky has been engaged with a pretty but poor girl (Swaroop Sampat). Now the question begins to haunt Seth Dhanpat rai - "What is more important? His children's happiness or what he is, i.e. power and money.". Dhanpath Rai's question is answered soon. At the end Seth Dhanpath Rai finds true wealth in his life.
cast: Sanjeev Kumar, Waheeda Rehman, Shashi Kapoor, Poonam Dhillon, Randhir Kapoor

title: Bank Chor
overview: A comic-caper, that tells the story of 3 morons trying to rob a bank who pick the worst day possible when everything that can go wrong, goes wrong and how they're inadvertently caught in the crossfire.
cast: Vivek Oberoi, Riteish Deshmukh, Rhea Chakraborty, Sahil Vaid, Bhuvan Arora

title: Dream Girl 2
overview: Karam, a small-town boy from Mathura, is struggling every day to pay his father's debt, who has borrowed money from nearly everyone on the planet. On the other hand, he is deeply in love with Pari, whose father has kept the conditions to marry her. To make ends meet, Karam dons as Pooja, which creates wild chaos and a comedy of errors.
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Ananya Panday, Annu Kapoor, Paresh Rawal, Vijay Raaz

title: Garv: Pride and Honour
overview: About to retire, police inspector Samar Singh changes his mind when he discovers that a recently elected official has ties with the underworld.
cast: Salman Khan, Shilpa Shetty Kundra, Arbaaz Khan, Amrish Puri, Farida Jalal

title: Satya
overview: A young man named Satya comes to Mumbai from South India in search of a job. Jailed for something he did not do, the once-honest young man meets an underworld boss, Bhiku Mhatre in jail and joins his gang.
cast: J. D. Chakravarthi, Manoj Bajpayee, Urmila Matondkar, Shefali Shah, Saurabh Shukla

title: Mangal Pandey - The Rising
overview: The film begins in 1857, when India was ruled by the British East India Company. Mangal Pandey is a sepoy, a soldier of Indian origin, in the army of the East India Company. Pandey is fighting in the Anglo-Afghan Wars and saves the life of his British commanding officer, William Gordon. Gordon is indebted to Pandey and a strong friendship develops between them, transcending both rank and race.
cast: Aamir Khan, Rani Mukerji, Toby Stephens, Ameesha Patel, Om Puri

title: Bhoot Police
overview: Two brothers Vibhooti and Chiraunji have fought their share of ghosts. However, a new case in a remote village forces them to rethink their own abilities and beliefs.
cast: Saif Ali Khan, Arjun Kapoor, Yami Gautam Dhar, Jacqueline Fernandez, Javed Jaffrey

title: Dhol
overview: Pankaj , Gautam, Sameer and Martand are roommates in Pune who are bound together by their ambition to make it big in life with the least effort possible. Each one tries his hand at finding a shortcut to success but ends up being in even deeper trouble. Things get worse when the four decide to take a loan at high interest which they are unable to pay back. They believe that the only way to get rich without working hard is to marry the wealthy girl in their neighborhood and each of the four friends embark on their individual plans to woo her.
cast: Sharman Joshi, Kunal Khemu, Tusshar Kapoor, Rajpal Yadav, Tanushree Dutta

title: All Ladies Do It
overview: A Handsome young man gets erotically involved with a Sultry seductive wife of an impotent man only to find himself tangles in a dangerous web of lies and cheat.
cast: Sejal Shah, Ajay Bafna, Vikas Sachdeva

title: Mere Yaar Ki Shaadi Hai
overview: Sanjay and Anjali are childhood chums. When Sanjay's roommate Ria declares he has fallen for Anjali, he vehemently denies it. But the truth hits him like a ton of bricks when Anjali calls to tell him that she is getting married to Rohit. Sanjay wants to win Anjali's heart at any cost and sets off on a mission to stop the wedding. Based partly on the American film "My Best Friend's Wedding" (1997).
cast: Uday Chopra, Tulip Joshi, Jimmy Shergill, Bipasha Basu

title: Jolly LLB
overview: Wanting to earn fame and fortune, a small time lawyer files a PIL for an infamous hit-and-run, and thus learns what it really is like to be a lawyer.
cast: Arshad Warsi, Boman Irani, Saurabh Shukla, Amrita Rao, Harsh Chhaya

title: Main Khiladi Tu Anari
overview: A Bombay police officer seeks revenge when his brother is killed by a powerful underworld figure. Things get complicated when a matinee movie idol begins to tag along the policeman so he can research a movie role.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Saif Ali Khan, Shilpa Shetty Kundra, Raageshwari, Shakti Kapoor

title: Ek Rishtaa: The Bond of Love
overview: A wealthy factory owner, played by  Amitabh Bachchan,  raises up his conniving son-in-law while breaking off with his own son, played by Akshay Kumar,  who then comes back to right all wrongs and save the family fortune.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Amitabh Bachchan, Karisma Kapoor, Mohnish Behl, Juhi Chawla Mehta

title: Notebook
overview: An ex-army officer, Kabir, becomes a teacher in Kashmir in a school that is in a miserable condition. Things take a turn when Kabir finds a notebook, left behind by the previous year's teacher Firdaus.
cast: Pranutan Bahl, Zaheer Iqbal, Farhana Bhat, Mir Sarwar, Hafsa Ashraf

title: Iqbal
overview: This is all about chasing your dreams, no matter what the obstacles. The story involves a young deaf and dumb boy who is crazy about cricket.
cast: Shreyas Talpade, Naseeruddin Shah, Girish Karnad, Shweta Basu Prasad, Prateeksha Lonkar

title: Umrao Jaan
overview: Bollywood film about the famous courtesan of the title. Aishwarya Rai stars in the lead role. The film is directed by J.P. Dutta and also stars Shabana Azmi, Sunil Shetty, Abhishek Bachchan, Divya Dutta, Himani Shivpuri and Kulbhushan Kharbanda.  A remake of the original directed by Muzaffar Ali and released in 1981.
cast: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Shabana Azmi, Suniel Shetty, Abhishek Bachchan, Bikram Saluja

title: Teri Meri Kahaani
overview: A couple lives though three different lives over different eras as destiny conspires to make them fall in love with each other, against all odds.
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Omar Khan, Prachi Desai, Neha Sharma

title: Gentleman
overview: Gentleman is a 1989 Indian feature film directed by Vinod R Verma, starring Govinda and Anuradha Patel
cast: Govinda, Anuradha Patel, Shakti Kapoor, Nagina Khan, Javed Khan

title: Thank God
overview: An egoistic real estate broker in huge debts, meets with an accident. As he gains consciousness, he realizes that he is in heaven. God appears before him and informs him that he must play a 'Game of Life'. If he manages to win, he will be sent back to earth; if he loses, he will be sent to hell.
cast: Sidharth Malhotra, Ajay Devgn, Rakul Preet Singh, Seema Pahwa, Kanwaljit Singh

title: Masti
overview: Three henpecked friends try to escape their unhappy marriages by seeking out some extramarital fun, only to end up being blackmailed.
cast: Vivek Oberoi, Aftab Shivdasani, Riteish Deshmukh, Amrita Rao, Genelia D'Souza

title: Tanu Weds Manu: Returns
overview: After Tanu and Manu's marriage breaks apart, the latter finds himself smitten by Datto, a lookalike of his ex-wife. But the estranged couple's feelings begin to spark again.
cast: Kangana Ranaut, R. Madhavan, Jimmy Shergill, Deepak Dobriyal, Swara Bhasker

title: Freddy
overview: Introverted and awkward Dr. Freddy Ginwala desperately searches for a soulmate. When he finally finds her, the relationship becomes as painful as a root canal.
cast: Kartik Aaryan, Alaya F, Karan A. Pandit, Sajjad Delafrooz, Jeniffer Piccinato

title: Jhoom Barabar Jhoom
overview: London, an overcrowded cafe, one table to share. Two strangers tell each other “how I met my fiancé” stories to kill time. Rikki met his fiance Anaida at the Ritz in Paris and Alvira met her prince charming Steve at Madame Tussauds
cast: Abhishek Bachchan, Lara Dutta, Preity Zinta, Bobby Deol, Robert Galas

title: Nil Battey Sannata
overview: Behind the magnificent Taj Mahal lies a cluster of dingy homes where Chanda (35), a domestic help, lives with her 14-year-old daughter Appu. Chanda aspires and dreams that her daughter will study and embrace a better fate. When Appu tells her she wants to quit school and become a maid like her, Chanda takes a strong decision: she will herself go back to school, and even join the class of her daughter.
cast: Swara Bhasker, Ratna Pathak Shah, Pankaj Tripathi, Riya Shukla, Sanjay Suri

title: Photograph
overview: A struggling street photographer, pressured to marry by his grandmother, convinces a shy stranger to pose as his fiancée. The pair develops a connection that transforms them in ways that they could not expect.
cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Sanya Malhotra, Farrukh Jaffar, Akash Sinha, Abdul Quadir Amin

title: Dream Girl
overview: Desperate to find employment, Karam picks up a job as ‘Pooja’ at a call center for sex chats, keeping most people in his life in the dark about the nature of his work. How long can he keep it up before everyone including his girlfriend and father find out?
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Nushrratt Bharuccha, Annu Kapoor, Manjot Singh, Vijay Raaz

title: Tashan
overview: Jeetendra Kumar Makwana is employed full-time at a Call Center and works part-time teaching English. He is recruited by an attractive young woman, Pooja, to teach her Hinglish-speaking boss, Bhaiyaji, English. Jeetendra agrees to do so, falls in love with Pooja, and joins forces with her to steal a bag containing 25 Crore Rupees in cash. He will soon find out that Bhaiyaji is a hoodlum and extortionist known to the Police as Lakhan Singh.
cast: Akshay Kumar, Saif Ali Khan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Anil Kapoor, Sanjay Mishra

title: Sainik
overview: Lieutenant Suraj Dutt has been in the Indian army for years. It is now time for him to take a leave of absence so that he can meet his father, Retired Colonel Yashpal Dutt, and sister, Minni. He travels home, and on the way rescues some school children held hostage by a group of armed men. The media portrays him as a hero, and it is here that he meets with a young woman named Alka, and both fall in love with each other. Alka and Suraj get the approval of their respective families' and get married. Minni also gets married to a young man named Vijay Ghai. Shortly after the marriage, Suraj leaves his pregnant wife and re-joins duty at the border. His father is the first one to get the news that he is missing, believed dead. He decides to keep his news from Alka and Minni. What Yashpal does not know that both Minni and Alka have already received this devastating news - and both have decided to keep a brave front and also hide it from each other...
cast: Akshay Kumar, Ashwini Bhave, Farheen, Alok Nath, Anupam Kher

title: Class of '83
overview: A hero policeman shunted to a punishment posting as the Dean of the police academy decides to punish the corrupt bureaucracy and its criminal allies in return by training five lethal assassin policemen.
cast: Bobby Deol, Anup Soni, Joy Sengupta, Vishwajeet Pradhan, Hitesh Bhojraj

title: Jawaani Jaaneman
overview: The carefree life of a 40-year-old playboy comes to a standstill when he comes to know that he has a 20 something-year-old daughter.
cast: Saif Ali Khan, Alaya F, Tabu, Chloé Booyens, Chunky Pandey

title: Machine
overview: Machine depicts the story of racing enthusiasts , who meet each other under mysterious circumstances. As their bond becomes stronger, they eventually fall in love. However, new things begin to unfold, which change their lives forever
cast: Mustafa Burmawala, Kiara Advani, Rishabh Arora, Shabbir Burmawala, Carla Dennis

title: Udaan
overview: Upon returning to his industrial hometown, a young man must decide whether to follow his own dreams or acquiesce to his father's plans for his future.
cast: Ronit Roy, Rajat Barmecha, Aayan Boradia, Ram Kapoor, Manjot Singh

title: Heropanti
overview: Two young people find love despite the violent landscape in which they live.
cast: Tiger Shroff, Kriti Sanon, Prakash Raj, Shireesh Sharma, Sandeepa Dhar

title: Kurbaan
overview: When a handsome young Indian couple (Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor) moves into the suburbs to claim their stake in the American dream, they are shocked to discover that they've become enmeshed in a secretive terrorist plot. But as tensions escalate, the bride begins to wonder if her husband has told her everything he knows.
cast: Saif Ali Khan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Vivek Oberoi, Dia Mirza, Om Puri

title: Body
overview: Kabir Lal is an alcoholic lawyer whose life is looking as if going down the drain. One morning he sees a stunningly attractive woman on a beach and is instantly enamored by her. By chance he sees her again in a restaurant and offers to buy her a drink. In the process he learns that her name is Sonia and she is married. Unable to resist, he asks her whether she would show him her home. It marks the beginning of a passionate affair, during which Kabir is told that Sonia's husband neglects her. But Sonia cannot leave him because she cannot support herself without her husband's money. Sonia suggests murder and Kabir, blind with lust, agrees. They manage to kill Sonia's husband and make it look like an accident, but then Kabir gets to see Sonia's other side: she no longer is the passionate lover as before, but is a cool-headed mean woman now who won't let go of her wealth at any cost.
cast: Bipasha Basu, John Abraham, Gulshan Grover, Vinay Pathak, Ranvir Shorey

title: Dasvi
overview: Jailed under a tough cop, an uneducated politician decides to spend his time studying for high school while his scheming wife has plans of her own.
cast: Abhishek Bachchan, Yami Gautam Dhar, Nimrat Kaur, Manu Rishi Chadha, Chittaranjan Tripathy

title: Baadshah
overview: A small time detective is mistaken as a CBI agent and gets embroiled in a deadly mission to save the Chief Minister from an assassination attempt.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Twinkle Khanna, Rakhee Gulzar, Amrish Puri, Johny Lever

title: Satyagraha
overview: Satyagraha is the story of a son who yearns for a father. Of a father, who grieves for his lost son. Of a young woman who fights so hard with life that she has forgotten to love. Of an ambitious rabble-rouser, for whom action is the knee-jerk mantra. It is the story of how these four discover one another, and come together to raise hell, shaking the powers that be to their very roots!
